vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2218 for a local utilities use limited to utility services on property zoned MF-2(A) Multifamily District, on the south line of Bank Street, east of Herndon Drive
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised site plan and conditions
Z201-217(CT)
